Body:
returnValue = """<response>
                     <relay0>1</relay0>
                     <relay1>1</relay1>
                     <relay2>1</relay2>
                     <relay3>1</relay3>
                     <relay4>1</relay4>
                     <relay5>1</relay5>
                     <relay6>1</relay6>
                     <relay7>1</relay7>
                     <relay8>1</relay8>
                     </response>"""
class Test:
    pass
ret = Test()
ret.text = returnValue
ret.reason = 'OK'
ret.status_code = 200
with mock.patch.object(app, 'getRelay', return_value=ret):
    for i in range(0, 8):
        app.set(i, 1)
    with qtbot.waitSignal(app.signals.statusReady):
        app.cyclePolling()
    assert [1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1] == app.status
